heading: atlanta slayings
subheading: police are still piecing together the details of thursday's shootings in atlanta, where mark barton, a day trader apparently sparked by stock market losses, went on a shooting rampage, killing nine people. he also bludgeoned to death his wife and two children, and had designs to kill several more victims before he was cornered by police and committed suicide.
author: wired staff
